title: Projects
description: List of projects I've worked on.

projectsList.name: FiveM Modern Loading Screen
projectsList.description: A sleek and fully customizable loading screen for your FiveM server! Designed with aesthetics and functionality in mind, this loading screen will enhance your players' experience while they wait to load into your server.

projectsList.name: FiveM Rockstar Editor UI
projectsList.description: This script allows FiveM players to access the Rockstar Editor directly in-game using the /editor command. It includes functionalities for recording, saving, and deleting clips, as well as taking high-quality photos.

projectsList.name: Fivem Smoking Script
projectsList.description: An interactive and immersive FiveM script that allows players to smoke cigarettes, cigars, or vapes with realistic animations and smooth transitions. Designed to enhance roleplay experiences by adding believable smoking mechanics, including lighting, holding, inhaling, and exhaling sequences. Built for easy integration into existing servers and compatible with popular inventory and UI systems.
